name: COPY
description:
This game was created for the 48 hour game jam final (Environment Impacts You) for GAME3033 at George Brown College.

Attempt to reach the exit by obtaining different abilities through copying your environment.

Clicking on coloured objects will give you certain traits that will allow you to complete the game. Spikes, doors, and targets cannot be copied!

Controls

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Camera

Mouse1 - Copy

Spacebar - Jump

Escape/P - Pause

Credits

Developed by Raven Powless

Gameplay Music - rezoner (CC-BY 3.0)

Additional Info

Due to the 48 hour time constraint of the game jam and additional things in my personal life, I was not able to add/polish as much as I would have liked and the game is a little rough because of that. However, I thought this idea/concept was interesting and I may explore it again in the future.
